item.title: [RELEASE] Ava's accumulator model [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Hello. I added this, because some ppls have asked this long time.

Download: http://uppit.com/v/NRICF1OL

Pictures:

Inventory:

Look:

Now add this code to your client’s class8.java.

if(i == 14590) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 3000; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 730;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 567;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 1120;// class8.anInt169 = -4;// class8.anInt194 = -1;// class8.anInt165 = 3001; class8.anInt200 = 3002; class8.anInt166 = 63; class8.anInt173 = 120; class8.anInt167 = 100; class8.anInt192 = 100; class8.anInt191 = 100; class8.anInt196 = 15; class8.anInt184 = 100; class8.anInt204 = 1923; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Ava's accumulator"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Ava's accumulator".getBytes(); }

Now how to get it to cape position.

Open your server folder and find item.java open it then search for this:cape
Now you should see lot of item ids add ava’s accumulator’s item id here:P

Congralutions!

Please post replys.

Read full topic
